title: Army Troops Deployed in Galle Face Area
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); In order to assist the Police and control the situation, the Sri Lanka Army deployed its troops in the Galle Face esplanade with immediate effect to protect civilians and maintain peace in the area.
Human Rights Commission condemns violence on peaceful protests, and police inaction
BREAKING: Police Curfew imposed for Colombo South, North, and Central
